item.title: Deploying Machine Learning using sklearn pipelines
item.description:
Description

PyData Chicago 2016

Sklearn pipeline objects provide an framework that simplifies the lifecycle of data science models. This talk will cover the how and why of encoding feature engineering, estimators, and model ensembles in a single deployable object.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Goetsch

item.title: Tuning Machine Learning Parameters using scikit-learn Gridsearch
item.description:
Description

At Braintree we rely on scikit-learn's Pipeline and Gridsearch concepts to build and tune our predictive models. I'll talk through how this looks, the benefits, and the custom classes we've built out to augment this process to integrate Pandas dataframes.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Goetsch
